title: Grass Roots in the Soil part 1

tasks.task: Farmer's Role in Prarie Transformation and Agricultural Development
subtasks: Protecting the natural prairie ecosystem
Understanding the benefits of prairie soil and its root structure
Recognizing the loss of prairie brooks and crystal clear watercourses
Appreciating the transition of prairie to cultivated land
Observing the impact of plowing on soil fertility and crop yields
Noting the transformation of prairie to farmland for grain crops, particularly oats
Considering the role of town development supported by agricultural profits
Reflecting on cattle farming and its contribution to the local economy
Admiring the resilience of beef production during different economic periods
Acknowledging the significance of corn as a key crop in prairie development
